query:
ALTER TABLE referral_conversions 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS referrerId INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS referredEmail VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT '',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS certificationId INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS certificationName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS certificationPrice DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS commissionRate INT DEFAULT 20,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS payoutId VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS payoutDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS clickedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS convertedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
command:

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS referrerId INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS referredEmail VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT '',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS certificationId INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS certificationName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS certificationPrice DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS commissionRate INT DEFAULT 20,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS payoutId VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS payoutDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS clickedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS convertedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
